name: Z-CORE
description:
A BULLET HELL SHOOT 'EM UP!

MASTER COLOR SWITCHING BULLETS TO DESTROY THE Z-CORE ONSLAUGHT!

HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE?

This is a very simple prototype / game loop inspired by one of my Twitch Subscribers as part of my "GAME BASED ON A SUBSCRIBER" streams I hold usually weekly.

This was developed in the spirit of a 3-4 hour game jam but I do hope to revisit this one as it was an absolute blast to work on.

CONTROLS
W, A, S, D - Move Ship

Left Mouse Button - Shoot (Hold Down) / Menus

Right Mouse Button - Swap Bullet Color

I hope you enjoy and look forward to any feedback you may have :)
